rows.label: qst300305_msg001
rows.name: 面接１後　FEV

rows.label: qst300305_msg002
rows.name: スパイだと思うならクロ。潔白ならシロを選んでくれ

rows.label: qst300305_msg003
rows.name: クロ

rows.label: qst300305_msg004
rows.name: シロ

rows.label: qst300305_msg005
rows.name: そうか、お前はそう感じたんだな

rows.label: qst300305_msg006
rows.name: 俺が思うに、グーラ人かどうかも怪しいぜ

rows.label: qst300305_msg007
rows.name: よし、次々いこうか

rows.label: qst300305_msg0001
rows.name: Umm... Very nice to meet you!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0002
rows.name: Name is Powapowa, from Avaritia.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0003
rows.name:
Me looking for job that not require
combat skills.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0004
rows.name: All right. Let's get started.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0005
rows.name: Yes, ask Powapowa away!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0051
rows.name: What should I ask about?

rows.label: qst300305_msg0052
rows.name: Her personal motivations

rows.label: qst300305_msg0053
rows.name: Her strongest skills

rows.label: qst300305_msg0054
rows.name: Where she sees herself in five years

rows.label: qst300305_msg0055
rows.name: Nothing in particular

rows.label: qst300305_msg0101
rows.name:
At first, me want job in Merc Group,
but that all about fighting. Not fit with
core skills of Powapowa.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0102
rows.name:
Then later, me hear about admin
position, so me leap at chance!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0103
rows.name:
Uh-huh. And why is it you want to
join the Merc Group?

rows.label: qst300305_msg0104
rows.name:
Well, Powapowa big,
big fan of big people!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0105
rows.name:
And Merc Group full to brim with big
people! Powapowa think would feel nice
if pet-pet on head with big hands!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0201
rows.name: Mo? Let Powapowa think...

rows.label: qst300305_msg0202
rows.name:
Strongest skill of Powapowa probably
glossy sheen of fur! It super fluffy
and soft to touch!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0203
rows.name:
It won't bother you even if lots of
people pet you?

rows.label: qst300305_msg0204
rows.name:
Powapowa happy when people pet-pet!
Make sure to tell that to mercs!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0205
rows.name:
If at end of long day, mercs need
to pet-pet Powapowa, could be nothing
happier!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0301
rows.name: Me not have any grandiose dream...

rows.label: qst300305_msg0302
rows.name:
But if able to cheer up sad people or
lonely through pet-pets, then that
enough for Powapowa.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0303
rows.name:
It must be hard work maintaining
your coat, no?

rows.label: qst300305_msg0304
rows.name:
Oh, tell Powapowa about it!
Me have rigorous fur-care regime.
Never miss day!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0305
rows.name:
That actually big benefit to Hræsvelgr.
Much clean water for rinsing fur!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0401
rows.name: Good, I think we'll stop here.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0402
rows.name:
We'll be making our decision in a
short while, so you're free to leave.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0403
rows.name:
Me understand. Looking forward
to good news!

rows.label: qst300305_msg0404
rows.name: Okay, let's bring in the next candidate.

rows.label: qst300305_msg0501
rows.name: Anything else you want to ask?
